meanings.definition: A person who is extremely enthusiastic or passionate about something.
meanings.sent1: She is a real fier when it comes to painting.
meanings.sent2: The fier cheered loudly at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The fier's excitement was contagious to everyone around.

meanings.sent5: The fier's dedication to the cause inspired others to join.

meanings.definition: To feel intense anger or aggression.

meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to fier at the sight of the vacuum cleaner.

meanings.definition: To make something more intense or extreme.
meanings.sent1: Adding chili powder will fier up the flavor of the soup.
